mapper.select: select id, name, createTime, inviteCode from team where id = #{teamId}

select t.id, t.name, t.createTime, t.inviteCode, count(tm.memberid) as howmanymembers, s.startTime, s.endTime, p.name as firstPlaceName from team t left join teammember tm on t.id = tm.teamid left join schedule s on t.id = s.teamid left join ( select p.name, s.teamid from place p join schedule s on p.id = s.placeid where rownum = 1 order by startTime ) p on s.teamid = p.teamid where t.id in ( select tm.teamId from teamMember tm where tm.memberId = #{memberId} ) group by t.id, t.name, t.createTime, t.inviteCode, s.startTime, s.endTime, p.name order by t.createTime
select id, name, createTime, inviteCode from team where inviteCode = #{inviteCode}
select m.id, m.nickname, m.userid, mp.storedFileName as member_photo from teamMember tm join member m on tm.memberId = m.id left join memberPhoto mp on m.id = mp.memberId where tm.teamId = #{teamId}
select id, startTime, endTime, placeId, content, teamId, createdTime from schedule where teamId = #{teamId} order by startTime

select ms.id, ms.teamId, ms.memberId, ms.content, ms.sentTime, ms.isUser, m.nickname as nickname from message ms join member m on ms.memberId = m.id
where teamId = #{teamId} order by sentTime
mapper.insert: insert into message (teamId, memberId, content, isUser) values (#{teamId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{isUser})
mapper.select: select count(*) from teamMember where memberId = #{memberId} and teamId = #{teamId}
select nickname from member where id = #{id}
select content from message where teamId = #{teamId} and memberId = #{memberId} and isUser = 0 order by id DESC fetch first 1 row only
